game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map points to the location of a lost artifact. Venture into the forgotten ruins and retrieve it.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the legendary Sword of Ages

task.description: Make your way through the dense forest and enter the entrance to the ruins.
Solve the puzzles written in runes to unlock the chamber where the artifact is hidden.
task.location: Ruins of Eldrid, Chamber of Enigmas

task.description: Battle the ancient guardian protecting the artifact and claim it as your own.
task.location: Ruins of Eldrid, Heart of the Temple
